scripts.build:local: cross-env NODE_ENV=local nest build && tsc-alias -p tsconfig.build.json
scripts.build:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development nest build && tsc-alias -p tsconfig.build.json
scripts.build:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production nest build && tsc-alias -p tsconfig.build.json
scripts.migration:local: cross-env NODE_ENV=local node -r tsconfig-paths/register -r ts-node/register node_modules/typeorm/cli.js migration:run -d src/data-source.ts
scripts.migration:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node -r tsconfig-paths/register -r ts-node/register node_modules/typeorm/cli.js migration:run -d src/data-source.ts
scripts.migration:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production node -r tsconfig-paths/register -r ts-node/register node_modules/typeorm/cli.js migration:run -d src/data-source.ts
scripts.migration:generate:local: cross-env NODE_ENV=local node -r tsconfig-paths/register -r ts-node/register node_modules/typeorm/cli.js migration:generate -d src/data-source.ts
scripts.migration:generate:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node -r tsconfig-paths/register -r ts-node/register node_modules/typeorm/cli.js migration:generate -d src/data-source.ts
scripts.migration:generate:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production node -r tsconfig-paths/register -r ts-node/register node_modules/typeorm/cli.js migration:generate -d src/data-source.ts
scripts.migration:revert:local: cross-env NODE_ENV=local node -r tsconfig-paths/register -r ts-node/register node_modules/typeorm/cli.js migration:revert -d src/data-source.ts
scripts.migration:revert:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node -r tsconfig-paths/register -r ts-node/register node_modules/typeorm/cli.js migration:revert -d src/data-source.ts
scripts.migration:revert:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production node -r tsconfig-paths/register -r ts-node/register node_modules/typeorm/cli.js migration:revert -d src/data-source.ts
